name: textDraggableView(_:willAnimateLiftWith:session:)
desc: Tells the delegate when the lift animation is about to begin, and gives you a chance to animate additional changes alongside the system animation.
declaration:
optional func textDraggableView(_ textDraggableView: UIView & UITextDraggable, 
            willAnimateLiftWith animator: UIDragAnimating, 
                        session: UIDragSession)
